title: Backpack Battles is another clear indie Steam hit
description: If you enjoyed the idea in Backpack Hero with inventory management, you may want to also take a look at the new Backpack Battles which has a similar basic theme but puts you in PvP battles against other players and it's proven to be quite a hit.

title: Duelists of Eden is a multiplayer spin-off of One Step From Eden
description: With Mega Man Battle Network styled combat, One Step From Eden was a fun chaotic gem from 2020 and now there's a multiplayer spin-off with Duelists of Eden out now.

title: PlayStation 3 emulator RPCS3 gets gamepad support for the main UI
description: Working with RPCS3 for PlayStation 3 emulation should now be a whole lot easier on the likes of the Steam Deck, other handhelds and for just gamepad users with the latest update.

title: Of Life and Land settlement-builder releases April 2
description: Need a new city / villager builder and love everything simulated to be a bit more alive? Keep an eye on Of Life and Land that hits Early Access on April 2nd.

title: EmuDeck 2.2.12 released to fix a bunch of issues
description: EmuDeck is one of the go-to solutions for emulation on Steam Deck and other systems, and the big 2.2 update recently had some issues so another update is out now with 2.2.12 to clean things up a bit.

title: Steam broke another record with over 35 million people online
description: It was only last week I was writing about Steam's growth hitting 34 million players online, and here they are breaking another record to hit well over 35 million.

title: Linux kernel 6.8 is out now with lots of new features
description: Linux kernel 6.8 has been released now by Linus Torvalds and as usual, there's absolutely tons of changes and new features.
